projectAbstract: Turns long chat messages into concise summaries using GenAI
benefits: Boosted productivity: Enables users to quickly catch up on missed conversations, or revisit discussions to extract key points, aiding in faster information digestion and more informed decision-making.
Improved accessibility: Ensures that all users, including those with a busy schedule or joining late, can easily access and understand the gist of discussions.
Enhanced engagement: Users are more likely to engage with and participate in conversations when they can quickly and easily understand the context and the key points.
